website_summaries.verdict: With its gorgeous resolution and captivating curved design, this computer monitor is a great choice for PC gaming.
pros: Dedicated Game Mode has premium contrast levels
Upscales content to a near 4K UHD image
cons: This is not the widest curved monitor offered by Samsung

customer_reviews.title: A great display with a HUGE catch
customer_reviews.text: Buying this for a PS4 Pro/PS5 or Xbox One X/series X? Go for it. It's cheap, 4K and incredibly clear. Also buying it for 4K UHD Netflix or Amazon Prime? Don't f***ing waste your money! This scam monitor lacks HDCP copyright protection required to stream 4K entertainment. I paid for UHD Netflix and this monitor and was underwhelmed by the quality, only to find out it's impossible to watch UHD content on this via either displayport or HDMI. There is no way Samsung didn't know about this, and they're ripping off many people who wouldn't know the difference between 1080p and 4K. I'm returning it, avoid! Find one that supports HDCP 2.2
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Cummins

customer_reviews.title: Superb and Excellent Value!!
customer_reviews.text: I wont go in to some massive nerding out review. I just want to say that if you want 4K at 32 inches but cant afford to be spending nearly a grand, then this option is extremely good . A very viable gaming, video/photo editing monitor at a great price.
customer_reviews.author: TobiasB

customer_reviews.title: Such a Shame...
customer_reviews.text: This product has a great potential but it was broke a few months in. I contacted Amazon to return it but they were unable to give me an appropriate returns method. So I'm stuck with a screen with a red line going right down the left hand side of the screen. May not seem much but spending over 7 hours a day looking at the screen and paying over £300 for it??? Its very annoying. This is the second product that I have purchased with this issue. Moral of the story..Remind myself NOT to purchase monitors from Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sims

customer_reviews.title: Misleading Description
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to connect a PS4 pro and Xbox one S both 4k, please be aware that it does state 2 x HDMI in the description but both are not 4K, only HDMI port 2 is 4K, this should have been made clearer, the screen and colours do look a little washed out and I have spent what seems like hours tweaking the picture, Have played Call of duty on this monitor and not experienced any lag of any sort, so overall not a bad monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Foxview

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this on Black Friday 2019 for £239 saving me 60 pounds but when I received the monitor and set it up it was broke the screen kept flashing and lines running through the screen all over the place. Sent it back took me about a month to get my money back by that time Black Friday is long gone and finished and the the monitor had gone back up in price - at the time of writing this it's now up for sale for £290 saving you a massive 20 or 30 pounds when on Black Friday it was going for £239 lol
customer_reviews.author: You think I'm not a fool?

customer_reviews.title: Great quality 4K picture but no remote.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clear vivid picture. Quick and easy to set up straight from the box. Sound production through attached speakers very good. No remote, so can only be switched on on the unit itself. Small control on the back of the unit used to toggle through inputs, brightness settings etc. This would be fiddly if you had to do it regular and/or if you had to change the input regularly without a remote, but if only used as a gaming monitor attached to one input, it’s not a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic all rounder.
customer_reviews.text: Three of these in my office, the real estate for working is a little ridiculous when you first start using; now I have my phone (bixby) showing in pip on 1/4 if right screen and my media player in 1/4 of my left, leaving the middle and the 3/4 of right and left, picture is great blacks are so black that I sometimes think they are off when they are on..
customer_reviews.author: Stuart Buchanan

customer_reviews.title: Wrong power lead included for UK
customer_reviews.text: So its true, monitor was delivered without the correct power adapter so had to call samsung and should be getting one delivered in the next week. Pretty easy to report the issue using the number 0333 000 0333 (for the uk) but never the less really annoying that you have to do this. Just hope its worth the wait. For some reason it does contain a uk lead but does not fit the monitor and the other lead / adapter included does fit the monitor but has the wrong plug (think its possibly European) not totally sure...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect work monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have a larger monitor at work and bought this for working from home - it is so much better. The curve makes it feel closer and more visible, and I use the whole area with spreadsheets, notes, design docs all visible without feeling like I have to move my chair sideways to see them! Oh and the picture quality is great. I don't need a VESA mount BUT that is the one thing missing.
customer_reviews.author: Michelobe

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 4K Monitor
customer_reviews.text: My previous Monitor (27") has been absolutely brilliant but a lot of the work I do is over a couple of different documents and a larger screen was a benefit. I also often have YouTube videos running etc. Some of my content is 4K and that is increasingly becoming the standard. Brilliant picture quality, well made and easy to set up. A great choice all round and at a very reasonable price. In fact it's showing up my PC's video capability. So a new PC could well be on the cards!!
customer_reviews.author: Vic Cox

customer_reviews.title: I literally just got this today & already I’m dissuaded from buying monitors off amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this monitor solely for the purpose of using my PS4 pro, and I immediately ran into a few issues which I will list below: - Green vertical lines briefly appeared at one point on the right hand side of the monitor followed by static (managed a quick fix by switching monitor off/on again. I hope this doesn’t happen again...) - The av plug when plugged in is slightly loose, which could be a long term issue. - Caused two blackouts after a few days of using it. Like, what the heck man! I’m literally contemplating whether or not I should've bought this in the first place; totally having second thoughts now, sigh.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hidden details not made clear
customer_reviews.text: 3 main features that were not made clear when purchasing: 1. This is not a HDR compatible monitor, in my opinion this is more important than 4k. 2. It should be clear that only the HDMI 2 slot is 4k 60hz, found this out by buying a new HDMI cable because I wasn't getting the full resolution. 3. The audio output only supports aux, and when buying a separate connection the sound quality was very poor so changed direct from my ps4 into the speaker which was fine.
customer_reviews.author: JCallow

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for the price, with very minor niggles
customer_reviews.text: A good monitor but be prepared for a couple of things...first off, mine (and seemingly many others) comes supplied with a European plug, not a UK one, so either be prepared to order one separately (about £10 on Amazon) or be prepared to spend a long time arguing with customer services until they agree to supply one (the route I took!!). Also, there are two hdmi ports on this monitor - one runs with a 60mhz refresh rate, the other is only 30 so make sure you plug into the right one. The manual is verily clear on which is which, it’s not something they’ve tried to hide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value but overall quality lacking
customer_reviews.text: When set up correctly the picture is good. The rest is sadly lacking which is a surprise from Samsung. Controls from a single joystick on the rear is fiddly and does not always work. After some hours, the screen says it will shut down within one minute if the joystick is not pressed, this despite actively working on the screen. Screen reflection is quite prevalent. Overall for what I paid in a warehouse deal I can live with the issues but I certainly would not pay full price.
customer_reviews.author: Murray

customer_reviews.title: No uk plug
customer_reviews.text: When one orders something electrical from a UK website, you EXPECT to get the product fitted WITH a UK plug so if you are thinking of ordering this product get an adapter plug at the same time, oh dont get me wrong they did try but even with the best magician out there you could not make use of what they sent. Photo attached, so because of this really poor show i have had to mark it down to 3 star otherwise i am happy with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Awful support
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is fine for the price. I bought it because it was one of the cheapest 4k monitors on the market and it wasn't a very first 4k model from 6 years ago. If you need more you should probably look elsewhere. The problem is I've received a model an EU plug only, which once inserted can't be removed from the power adapter. Samsung refused to provide a replacement adapter asking me to contact the seller (Senetic Ltd) instead. The seller did nothing for over a month and is no longer replying to emails. In a normal situation I'd have sent it back but when working from home in the middle of lock down this wasn't an option.
customer_reviews.author: mmm

customer_reviews.title: Monitor does not wake up if connected to display port.
customer_reviews.text: Great display quality, fantastic size.. BUT.... I bought a pair of these to use in my studio. One is connected to the HDMI one to the display port on my Mac. These Monitor connected to the display port do not wake up and have to be unplugged and re connected in order to work. I have swapped the monitors around, changed cables and computers to check this problem, and can confirm there appears to be an issue with the display port.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic display, limited by poor adjustment options and no speakers
customer_reviews.text: First the good: The panel is beautiful, nicely curved and good image quality. The controls are a little odd to adjust to, but are nice and simple. The bad: Theres no VESA mount option Using the stand, you have no height adjustment at all, which can make for poor ergonomics (neck ache!). Theres no speakers, so just be aware you will need to buy external speakers.
customer_reviews.author: attonomy

customer_reviews.title: Good value, mediocre viewing angles
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is OK for the price and renders full 4k. This appears to be a TN screen, and not IPS, so consequently brightness and colour change significantly depending on viewing angle. There is a difference in lag between the colours, so there's a significant green fringe trailing any scrolling black block. No internal speakers. Only 2 of the 3 inputs handle 60Hz at 4K.
customer_reviews.author: omphalos

customer_reviews.title: Great for professional work/media consumption
customer_reviews.text: The blacks are nice and dark, the whites are almost too bright at times (which is great for movie's) and the colour accuracy is great!! Gaming is also fantastic! How ever, it does have a more motion blur than most gamer's would like. All in all, as a CGI Artist, VFX Artist, Gamer, Content creator and consumer, I would say this is a 9.5/10!! Would 100% recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic screen
customer_reviews.text: Disclaimer - I am not a serious gamer That being said, I feel like I have put that screen through it's paces and as a workstation it is brilliant. The curved effect was really useful for the work I was doing. Watching films has been really great on it. The games I've played have been great but I don't play any games that will test refresh rates to the limit but I'm sure it's worth considering this.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. R. J. Lawless

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: i was just on chat and was told that the monitor will be removed from the site due to it being wrong information for UK. the plug in the box is not the UK version. o ordered this on Tuesday and waited till Friday even with prime to be disappointed. now i have to return it and wait for my money to be refunded. i was looking forward to 4k
customer_reviews.author: Darren Hall

customer_reviews.title: No good for 4k gaming sadly!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Is nice picture, but DON'T buy if you want it for better gaming ie Xbox one as the pix is not quite enough, ie is not ULHD, therefore isn't quite 4K, now have a very disappointed son!!!
customer_reviews.author: S C O ♿

customer_reviews.title: Description inadequate
customer_reviews.text: VESA option not available. Monitor arrived damaged - front bottom right corner of the base broken. Picture-by-picture doesn't work well on Mac. The overall picture quality is good, but it's giving headache and eyes tiredness 10 times more than the laptop. Works well from 2-meter distance only as TV. Disappointed with the high expectations from the Curved 2019 design winner / or might be my requirements (based on Mac usage) are too high.
customer_reviews.author: Tony_M

customer_reviews.title: Superb image but lousy stand
customer_reviews.text: This monitor can currently be found for under £300 which is a bargain The image is superb with vibrant colour and decent brightness Being only 60Hz it won't suit hardcore gamers but it's fine for business/light gaming Sadly it's let down by a poor stand with thick feet protruding too far forward and interfering with keyboard placement Others may require either a desk mount or bracket but why it just couldn't be flat like most others I don't know!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. G. Routledge

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Monitor spoilt by stand
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic monitor, picture quality is excellent, but and it is a BIG BUT...this monitor can ONLY be used with the enclosed stand, which has no height adjustment. For some reason best known to Samsung it DOES NOT HAVE a VESA mount. Having to "mount" my brand new monitor on a pile of books to get it to the right height is not great!
customer_reviews.author: thunderchild999

customer_reviews.title: Beware the power supply
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is fine, it's a lovely big 4k display - what's not to like? However, my unit, along with others according to the other reviews, came with a UK power cable that does not connect to the power adapter! I had to obtain another adapter to be able to power up the monitor from a UK power socket. This appears to be a major mistake by Samsung. If in the UK, ensure you have a US -> UK power adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent picture and colour.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, with really good picture quality. Not noticed any ghosting at all, and the adjustable response time is probably to thank (it has 3 settings: normal, faster, fastest). It has really great colour and the blacks are pretty true. Only complaint is that it does have a tendency to try turning itself off to save power when still in use, so you have to lean over to stop it from switching off.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Check the packaging, parts missing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the monitor for CAD work this is the second one I have, both work well. What was disappointing with the second purchase is that Samsung packaged the item with incorrect parts, in this case the UK three pin connector for the power supply meaning the monitor was useless until a suitable adaptor could be found. Samsung's performance in supporting this was less than useless and Amazon required two attempts to resolve. Overall nothing wrong with the product apart from incorrect packaging and woeful after sales support from Samsung and Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than many of the reviews
customer_reviews.text: Does what it says on the tin. Image quality out of the box is great and the colour accuracy looks good. I'll calibrate it soon and know for sure. Unlike some of the reviews, mine had no dead pixels or other image problems. Like many report, the power adaptor cable is a problem, the slightest movement of the cable causes the plug to drop out: Hence only 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Gary Plumley

customer_reviews.title: Drops laptop HDMI connection / lack of built in speakers
customer_reviews.text: Monitor regularly drops the screen application back to main laptop when the screen saver kicks in. so you have to move all your screens back each time. The laptop thinks that the monitor has built in speakers and sets it as default when it hasn't. Lack of built in speakers is a major downside. Quality of the screen is excellent but these 2 issues above make it a no-go for me. I am returning the second replacement as the first monitor arrived with screen damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gaskin

customer_reviews.title: A capable monitor
customer_reviews.text: So a mistake was made when I got this, I needed a vesa capable panel and this is not one of those despite it being said it could. Picture is really nice and if set up correctly ghosting is not a problem when gaming (take the time) 3 stars... Lack of height adjustability and lack of vesa mount support.
customer_reviews.author: G. TUCKER

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, just be prepared if you buy in the UK. Power lead isn't compatible
customer_reviews.text: I love the quality of the screen and the look of the thing. Very stylish. A little disappointed at the laughable attempt to make it appear that you can plug in in the UK, though. You get a standard 2 pin EU cable with a seperate UK plug that can't possibly be compatible. Are you supposed to cut & solder? Stupid and unprofessional for the price. Fortunately I had a 2 pin UK cable knocking around. I also didn't receive the DP cable described in the product info, just a very nice HDMI. On the whole, happy with the product, but let down by silly small penny pinching details.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Martin Dinneen

customer_reviews.title: Wrong adaptor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor has a EU power connector. Comes with an UK adaptor but NOT for the EU connector. This is annoying as had to buy a power adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: BEWARE: no UK/Ireland plug. You’ll have to buy an adapter.
customer_reviews.text: 1/5 not on the merits, but on an awful experience. This monitor cannot be used out of the box in UK and Ireland, you’ll have to purchase a fused adapter separately. The power transformer comes with a custom plug that fits into a mainland Europe 2-pin plug, and that’s about it. I also received a IEC C7 cable in the box with a standard UK plug, but it was utterly useless, as it wouldn’t fit anywhere in the monitor or the power transformer. Not sure if this was Samsung’s or Amazon’s fault, but it’s certainly not what I expect from either of those companies. This listing should not be on the UK website.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this 32 inch monitor I can not fault it ( I paid just under £240 for it in Amazon sales ). If i had to find one fault for it, it would be it's stand but after a week I just bought another stand from Amazon for about £20.
customer_reviews.author: Blackstar

customer_reviews.title: Backlight bleed terrible
customer_reviews.text: The backlight bleed on this monitor was terrible. Returned item for refund without any problems.
customer_reviews.author: Harry Ridley

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the sale price, but for gaming better off buying a more specialised monitor
customer_reviews.text: Picked this up for £270 as a prime day sale, at that price point it blows most competing monitors out the window, however for the £360 price point it is a 32inch 4k monitor that lacks HDR and has an average refresh rate and response time, so one could get a better deal if they do some hunting if they intend to use it for gaming. Aside from that, the picture quality is excellent, the monitor has built in upscaling which is good for me as my PC struggles with native 4k at times and is great for all who have 1080p devices that could stand to benefit from the upscaling.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awful Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Always thought Samsung made good monitors - not this one ! The colour Black is so washed out it looks light Grey had to crank the Brightness and Contrast way down to try and make it at least useable. Very disappointed buyer.
customer_reviews.author: AF

customer_reviews.title: Clear quality large screen
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the start of lockdown so i could work from home. I normally use two large screens in the office, i didnt realise how much of a difference this monitor makes. When i went back in the office the old screens felt tiny.
customer_reviews.author: Jaswinder singh

customer_reviews.title: Get the right cable
customer_reviews.text: Lovely looking monitor. Hooked it up with a regular dvi cable which would only let me display 1980 res. Bought a display port cable and bang. Instant UHD res at the correct 3180 x 2160 Menu switch is a bit weird at the back right hand side, but no issues really. Great monitor for the price
customer_reviews.author: Peter Cameron Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Extremely bad ghosting On PS4 Pro
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this for gaming. Picture quality looks good if your moving slow but as soon as you start to move with a bit of pace I noticed really bad ghosting when playing Fifa 21. Arranged a refunded within half an hour
customer_reviews.author: Mr C

customer_reviews.title: Problems with Samsung monitors
customer_reviews.text: Will not wake from sleep ! Had to set one of my other monitors to master as this only starts in 30hz mode although my card is set to 60hz (yes it's in hdmi2) have to set to 60 in menu every time it's turned on !
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Sent mine back.
customer_reviews.text: No speakers, so you need to faf about with external ones. Horrible, fiddly joystick thing mounted on the back of the monitor, no remote control. Only one of the two hdmi ports is 4k. Sent it back.....Good picture to be fair, but the negatives outweighed the positives.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd Christmas

customer_reviews.title: Faulty item delivered
customer_reviews.text: I received an open box, with some of the cables/chargers taken outside of the box, dropped off in front of my door. When I connceted the screen there were lines all over the picture and it was clear that the monitor was falty/had been damaged during transit. Had to return after a lot of hassle. Do not recommend. The Amazon curstomer service on the phone was also disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. H. V. V

customer_reviews.title: Not for Work, also Packaging and Handling are *$Y((&!)#^@&$^!
customer_reviews.text: In my opinion, advertising this product as wall-mountable, then not shipping suitable screws, is a disgrace. I have bought this monitor for coding, with a third of the left and right sides of the screen not having proper contrast, but looking white-ish instead, I have less than half of the screen where the text is easy to read. The image shows the monitor at a brightness setting of 40%, and contrast at 70%. Maybe I have received a Monday product, but I didn't have such problems with even bigger monitors, which were uniformly black everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: public name

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for the money
customer_reviews.text: I looked at many monitors, and considering my need for MS Office and GIS, and limited budget, and decided on this 28 inch. I am extremely happy with the monitor, its ease of setup, and picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tui

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy this from Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Singed up to prime to get a quick delivery however the first monitor arrived and was all setup with the exception of the power. Then discovered that the monitor is delivered with the wrong UK adaptor cable. Returned this and next monitor arrived on Wednesday - 2 days later - however this also had the wrong UK adaptor in the box. Why oh why can't Samsung sort out the correct adaptor? They must have produced a whole batch with the wrong ones - these should all have been recalled.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Comes with a European plug only!
customer_reviews.text: Be warned this only comes with a European plug. Had to use an old trick to get it to fit.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrance Devlin

customer_reviews.title: Great product for work and gaming
customer_reviews.text: I got this to be docked to my laptop mainly for WFH. It did serve that purpose and more. It is great to watch movies on this and is wonderful for gaming (although have tested it against the high graphic req ones). enjoying it so far.
customer_reviews.author: SanV

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Cheap 4k Monitor
customer_reviews.text: There are certain draw backs compared to other monitors with 4k resolution, but as a cheap 4k model you get value for money. Only real draw back is the stand isnt as sturdy as it could be, although it wont topple over or break from normal use, it will allow the screen to shake if the desk is knocked, best not to use on a cheap desk or table as it will rock the screen about
customer_reviews.author: Not Larry Squires

customer_reviews.title: How can Samsung send this but with the wrong outlet plug for the uk?
customer_reviews.text: When setting this up, went to go and plug it in UK based, there was an extra cable given the doesn't even have a place to connect it to for the up 3 prong outlet, gets given European outlet so yea can't even use this monitor, cause tried a universal plug and the monitor didn't even get power. This product need and review for UK use. Had to get refunded the money. The best thing amazon should do is relist this saying, not UK outlet included and not still have it on the deals
customer_reviews.author: daniel davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for games
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for gaming, the overall quality of my games has hugely improved,the picture quality is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returned within 2 hours
customer_reviews.text: Came with the UK adaptor for the Samsung power brick missing. Tried using the 2 pin with my own adapter, wouldn't even turn on. Back at the local parcel shop to return within 2 hours of receipt. What a waste of time. Avoid but if you do purchase make sure you check the box on receipt to make sure nothing is missing! The funny thing is it came with a UK plug attached to a kettle lead. Plot twist: a kettle lead connects to NOTHING with this monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is my second monitor I use for outlook etc and it’s a great improvement picture and ergonomically wise. Really like it but also have a 43 inch 4K monitor for gamin
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Superb
customer_reviews.text: Love it - great screen. Playing games now more engaging.
customer_reviews.author: R. Eagle

customer_reviews.title: Samsung monitor
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is ok for gaming. The mulity selector knob at the rear can be a bit awkward till you get used to it. The monitor does not have speakers however, does have a 3.5mm output Jack so speakers can be connected.
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Auto detect annoying but great quality screen
customer_reviews.text: Using this between 2 laptops so always on picture by picture split in the screen, sharing between the 2 devices. Great screen but annoying that it doesn't automatically detect both hdmi inputs when hiring the laptops.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. DP Yates

customer_reviews.title: Not great image quality
customer_reviews.text: Not what I expected from a 4K monitor, very poor image quality and clarity tried on numerous machines with no improvement, fails to turn back on after standby to have to press the switch and pixels dropping with only 3 weeks use. Seems overall poor and will be looking to return now pixels are going.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Expect a surprise
customer_reviews.text: This is a monitor and is used as a monitor but it is very frustrating when every 30minutes the screen closes down even my cheap one from China never did that!
customer_reviews.author: Paul G Price

customer_reviews.title: Great value monitor
customer_reviews.text: I'm using to work basically and it's well worth each penny. I had an LG before and doesn't even get close to this one. I totally recommend
customer_reviews.author: Diego Furtado

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: Really good looking screens. Build quality could have been a bit better but it’s common issue with Samsung’s products that they always compromise on build quality. Overall very happy.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: i'm a gamer and here is my review! :3
customer_reviews.text: nwyaa hewwo UwU :3 i bought this monitor to game with me senpaii ayee OwO 4k very nice great picture of my games :))
customer_reviews.author: alvis fereira

customer_reviews.title: No vesa support
customer_reviews.text: Never got to use the monitor as it does not have any way of mounting the screen, although it states it is vesa compatible....it is not.
customer_reviews.author: Daren

customer_reviews.title: Not UK plug
customer_reviews.text: I received a monitor with some sort of foreign plug. No use at all. So I had to waste a bunch of time repacking it and returning it.
customer_reviews.author: John R. Wade

customer_reviews.title: Mine was no good at all
customer_reviews.text: I have to review it as low as this as my TV was flicking all the time also kept going off every 10 seconds.. not a good build quality
customer_reviews.author: ilyas

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money.
customer_reviews.text: A high price value ratio. Bought two of these, one for home, one for work, and I really can't complain. The build quality is not the best, but the price was great, hence the high value for money score.
customer_reviews.author: Tony Baynes

customer_reviews.title: Impressive
customer_reviews.text: This is big enough for my gaming needs and the clarity is superb, I haven't noticed any lag in frame rates either.
customer_reviews.author: Colin

customer_reviews.title: Impressive for the price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very stylish impressive piece of kit for a very reasonable price! Feels premium and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: THE POWER SUPPLY IS EUROPEAN
customer_reviews.text: The monitor itself is awesome, especially for the money. However, be warned if you're buying this specific monitor from this seller in the UK on Amazon because the power supply is European. It comes with a UK plug, however it's pointless because there's no way of adapting it or plugging it into the monitor, so in order to use it you have to buy a European to UK plug adaptor.
customer_reviews.author: Neet

customer_reviews.title: Superb display.
customer_reviews.text: Whiter than white, brighter than bright. Easy to setup and looks nice on my desk. Highly recommended.

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't reccomend
